name: urgent-care-checkin
description: patient = name, last name, phone number, date of birth, insurance(y/n), reason for visit

scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js

author: PD, ES, MB
